code: import CartActionTypes from'./cart.types';export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:CartActionTypes.TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearItemFromCart=function clearItemFromCart(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.CLEAR_ITEM_FROM_CART,payload:item};};export var clearCart=function clearCart(){return{type:CartActionTypes.CLEAR_CART};};
